remoteClasses.name: Composite
remoteClasses.doc: A :rom:cls:`Hub` that mixes the :rom:attr:`MediaType.AUDIO` stream of its connected sources and constructs a grid with the :rom:attr:`MediaType.VIDEO` streams of its connected sources into its sink

params.name: mediaPipeline
params.doc: the :rom:cls:`MediaPipeline` to which the dispatcher belongs

methods.name: setBackgroundImage
methods.doc: Sets the background image of the episode meeting.

params.name: uri
params.doc: The path of the backgroud image, can be http file or local file.

methods.name: setStyle
methods.doc: Sets the style of the composite video, e.g. message, name, frame position, etc.

methods.name: getStyle
methods.doc: Gets the style of the composite video, e.g. message, name, frame position, etc.
